lead_paragraph: An Army deserter who called Osama bin Laden “a beautiful man,” made statements supporting the Islamic State group and called for the death of American troops has been charged with illegally possessing firearms.

headline.print_headline: Washington: Gun Charges for Man Said to Back Isis
headline.main: Washington: Gun Charges for Man Said to Back Isis

snippet: An Army deserter who called Osama bin Laden “a beautiful man,” made statements supporting the Islamic State group and called for the death of American troops has been charged with illegally possessing firearms.
abstract: Army deserter Daniel Seth Franey is charged with five counts of unlawful gun possession in Tacoma, Wash, for making what he believed were black-market gun deliveries; had made comments in support of Islamic State and was barred from having guns in light of protection order taken out by his former partner.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
